text: The Ulmaridae are a family of jellyfish. ==Genera== Diplulmaris antarctica from offshore of McMurdo Station, Ross Island. Formerly, the genus Phacellophora was also included in this family, but is now placed in the family Phacellophoridae.Straehler-Pohl, I., C. L. Widmer, and A. C. Morandini (2011). Characterizations of juvenile stages of some semaeostome Scyphozoa (Cnidaria), with recognition of a new family (Phacellophoridae). Zootaxa 2741: 1-37 *Aurelia (includes the moon jelly) *Aurosa *Deepstaria *Diplulmaris *Discomedusa *Floresca *Parumbrosa *Poralia *Stellamedusa *Sthenonia *Stygiomedusa *Tiburonia *Ulmaris ==References==
title: Ulmaridae
